channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What To Know About Former Pro Basketball Players Getting College Eligibility
item.description: Here's what to know about the recent surge of former NBA G League players and international pros joining college basketball.

item.title: 2025 NFL Week 18 Buzz: Indianapolis Colts Make QB Decision
item.description: Who's hurt? Who's practicing? Who's starting? Who's on the hot seat? Here's the latest on what's happening around the league entering Week 18.

item.title: 2025 College Football Playoff Buzz: Chip Kelly Back in College Football
item.description: Here's the latest on what's happening around college football during the postseason.

item.title: 2025 NFL Odds Week 18: Lines, Spreads for all 16 Games
item.description: Check out the odds for every NFL Week 18 matchup, the final regular-season weekend of the season.

item.title: Game Changers: Why Jeremiah Smith Almost Flipped From Ohio State to Miami
item.description: Florida native and Ohio State star Jeremiah Smith will face a slew of familiar faces when the Buckeyes face Miami in the Cotton Bowl.

item.title: Falcons, Bijan Robinson run over Rams in Week 17 MNF win
item.description: Atlanta escapes a late push by Los Angeles to improve to 7-9. Here's what to know about the game.

item.title: Our 2025 All-Rookie Team: We picked standout first-years at every single position
item.description: We know Carson Schwesinger makes the list at LB, but is Cam Ward or Tyler Shough the QB1?

item.title: Premier League summer transfer overperformers: Madueke, Xhaka lead the way
item.description: With the January window opening, here are the 10 players who have most impressed.

item.title: Updated NFL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, plus what we learned about each team this season
item.description: Let's update our NFL Power Rankings one more time ahead of Week 18. We also picked out lessons for all 32 teams in 2025.

item.title: From Liverpool to Chelsea, ranking 8 Premier League clubs' transfer needs
item.description: The January transfer window is about to open, so let's look at which Premier League teams need to make moves to improve for the rest of the season.
